snippet.title: Trillion: God of Destruction Gameplay Trailer - Fighting Trillion
snippet.description:
You've done the training and bonded with your Overlord, now it's time to put your hard work to the test! In the ultimate battle against Trillion, make sure you keep these basics handy!

Trillion 1,000,000,000,000™: God of Destruction challenges North America and Europe on March 29th and April 1st respectively, exclusively on the Playstation®Vita handheld entertainment system as a digital release and a physical release! It’s up to you, Zeabolos, to strategically battle against this god with a trillion HP! With six Overlord candidates at your disposal, change the tide of battle through rigorous training, forging strong bonds, and making painful sacrifices, all to stop Trillion from consuming the Underworld in this groundbreaking and emotional strategy RPG!

Check out the official website here! http://ideafintl.com/trillion

PREORDER Trillion: God of Destruction TODAY!
NA: http://bit.ly/1od9yYR
EU: http://bit.ly/1KFQbSi

©2016 IDEA FACTORY / COMPILE HEART / PREAPP PARTNERS All rights reserved. Trillion 1,000,000,000,000 is a trademark of IDEA FACTORY. Licensed to and published by Idea Factory
